title: A Shave, a Haircut, and a Blood Pressure Test (Ep. 6 Update)
description: For Black men, the barbershop is a neighborhood hub. It could also be a place for them to get medical care. Plus: What happens to patients when affirmative action ends?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
